title: What you need to know about Fallout 3 before playing Fallout 4
text:
What you need to know about Fallout 3 before playing Fallout 4 
Published By: Geek.com - Today 
By 2008, consoles and PCs could handle vast 3D worlds, and with that came mechanics, aesthetics, and a new story and setting to help explain...
